ticket.title: ActiveSupport timezone tests: silence_warnings still needed?
ticket.original-body:
many of the time zone related tests in ActiveSupport are wrapped in a call to "silence_warnings"
@@@ silence_warnings do # silence warnings raised by tzinfo gem ... end @@@
is this really needed? I don't seem to get any warnings if I remove all those calls (patch attached)
ticket.latest-body:
many of the time zone related tests in ActiveSupport are wrapped in a call to "silence_warnings"
@@@ silence_warnings do # silence warnings raised by tzinfo gem ... end @@@
is this really needed? I don't seem to get any warnings if I remove all those calls (patch attached)
ticket.original-body-html:
many of the time zone related tests in ActiveSupport are wrapped in a call to "silence_warnings"


silence_warnings do # silence warnings raised by tzinfo gem
  ...      
end

is this really needed? I don't seem to get any warnings if I remove all those calls (patch attached)

version.title: ActiveSupport timezone tests: silence_warnings still needed?

version.body: (from [b91d98011ce4cb364dcaa9caecd571eb2c697659]) Remove obsolete silence_warnings wrappers from TZInfo-dependent tests in ActiveSupport [#1914 state:resolved] http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/b91d98011ce4cb364dcaa9caecd571eb2c697659
